resources.string: "1. Tap the shuffle button and see what dice you get."
"2. Choose which dice to keep by tapping them. After this, press reshuffle to change the remaining dice. Reshuffling is allowed twice. You may also keep all your dice and not reshuffle."
"3. Select a category and press the ok button ('green tick') to register your score."
"4. Wait for your opponent to do his turn. 5. Have fun!"
